mapper.sql: select d.data_id,d.data_uuid,d.data_date,d.data_applicant,d.data_company,d.data_borough,d.data_street,d.data_type,d.data_level,d.data_theme,d.data_desc,d.data_flag,d.data_river,d.data_update_date, a.audit_id,a.data_id,a.user_id,a.user_name,a.audit_status,a.audit_result,a.audit_date,a.audit_create from dm_data d left join dm_audit a on d.data_id = a.data_id
mapper.select:
select d.data_id,d.data_uuid,d.data_date,d.data_applicant,d.data_company,d.data_borough,d.data_street,d.data_type,d.data_level,d.data_theme,d.data_desc,d.data_flag,d.data_river,d.data_update_date from dm_data d left join dm_audit a on d.data_id = a.data_id where d.data_flag = '0' and a.audit_status='1'
AND d.data_theme like concat(concat('%',#{dataTheme}),'%')
AND d.data_type = #{dataType}
AND d.data_borough like concat(concat('%',#{dataBorough}),'%')
AND d.data_river like concat(concat('%',#{dataRiver}),'%')
AND d.data_date >= to_date(#{params.beginTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
AND d.data_date <= to_date(#{params.endTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
${params.dataScope}

select d.data_id,d.data_uuid,d.data_date,d.data_applicant,d.data_company,d.data_borough,d.data_street,d.data_type,d.data_level,d.data_theme,d.data_desc,d.data_flag,d.data_river,d.data_update_date from dm_data d left join dm_audit a on d.data_id = a.data_id where a.audit_status='1'
AND d.data_theme like concat(concat('%',#{dataTheme}),'%')
AND d.data_borough like concat(concat('%',#{dataBorough}),'%')
AND d.data_river like concat(concat('%',#{dataRiver}),'%')
AND d.data_date >= to_date(#{params.beginTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
AND d.data_date <= to_date(#{params.endTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
${params.dataScope}

select d.data_id,d.data_uuid,d.data_date,d.data_applicant,d.data_company,d.data_borough,d.data_street,d.data_type,d.data_level,d.data_theme,d.data_desc,d.data_flag,d.data_river,d.data_update_date from dm_data d left join dm_audit a on d.data_id = a.data_id where d.data_flag='2'
AND d.data_theme like concat(concat('%',#{dataTheme}),'%')
AND d.data_borough like concat(concat('%',#{dataBorough}),'%')
AND d.data_river like concat(concat('%',#{dataRiver}),'%')
AND d.data_date >= to_date(#{params.beginTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
AND d.data_date <= to_date(#{params.endTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
${params.dataScope}
mapper.insert:
select seq_dm_data.nextval as dataId from DUAL
insert into dm_data( data_id, data_uuid, data_applicant, data_company, data_borough, data_street, data_type, data_level, data_theme, data_desc, data_river, data_update_date, data_date )values( #{dataId}, #{dataUuid}, #{dataApplicant}, #{dataCompany}, #{dataBorough}, #{dataStreet}, #{dataType}, #{dataLevel}, #{dataTheme}, #{dataDesc}, #{dataRiver}, #{updateTime}, sysdate )
mapper.update:
update dm_data set data_flag = #{dataFlag} where data_id in
#{dataId}
